trans-unit.source: Sends createIndex commands to mongo for each index declared in the schema. The createIndex commands are sent in series.

trans-unit.source: Sends multiple insertOne, updateOne, updateMany, replaceOne, deleteOne, and/or deleteMany operations to the MongoDB server in one command. This is faster than sending multiple independent operations (like) if you use create()) because with bulkWrite() there is only one round trip to MongoDB.
trans-unit.target: 通过一个命令将多个 insertOne ， updateOne ， updateMany ， replaceOne ， deleteOne 和/或 deleteMany 操作发送到MongoDB服务器。这比发送多个独立操作（例如，如果您使用 create() ）要 bulkWrite() 因为使用bulkWrite（）到MongoDB只有一次往返。

However, for historical reasons, this alternate declaration must be enabled via an option (either on the parent schema instantiation or on the mongoose instance).

trans-unit.source: Since Mixed is a schema-less type, you can change the value to anything else you like, but Mongoose loses the ability to auto detect and save those changes. To tell Mongoose that the value of a Mixed type has changed, you need to call doc.markModified(path), passing the path to the Mixed type you just changed.
trans-unit.target: 由于Mixed是一种无模式类型，因此您可以将其值更改为其他任何值，但是Mongoose失去了自动检测和保存这些更改的功能。要告诉Mongoose混合类型的值已更改，您需要调用 doc.markModified(path) ，将路径传递给刚更改的混合类型。

trans-unit.source: So far we haven't done anything much different. We've merely created a Person and a Story. Now let's take a look at populating our story's author using the query builder:
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们并没有做太多不同的事情。我们只是创建了一个 Person 和一个 Story 。现在，让我们看一下使用查询生成器填充故事 author 的情况：

trans-unit.source: So far we've created two Models. Our Person model has its stories field set to an array of ObjectIds. The ref option is what tells Mongoose which model to use during population, in our case the Story model. All _ids we store here must be document _ids from the Story model.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们已经创建了两个模型。我们的 Person 模型将其 stories 字段设置为 ObjectId 的数组。在 ref 的选择是什么告诉猫鼬种群期间要使用的模型，在我们的例子中 Story 模式。所有 _id š我们这里存储必须是文件 _id 从S Story 模式。

trans-unit.source: So far we've seen how to connect to MongoDB using Mongoose's default connection. At times we may need multiple connections open to Mongo, each with different read/write settings, or maybe just to different databases for example. In these cases we can utilize mongoose.createConnection() which accepts all the arguments already discussed and returns a fresh connection for you.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们已经了解了如何使用Mongoose的默认连接连接到MongoDB。有时，我们可能需要打开多个连接到Mongo，每个连接具有不同的读/写设置，或者可能仅连接到不同的数据库。在这些情况下，我们可以利用 mongoose.createConnection() 接受已经讨论过的所有参数，并为您返回一个新的连接。

trans-unit.source: So far you've only populated based on the _id field. However, that's sometimes not the right choice. In particular, arrays that grow without bound are a MongoDB anti-pattern. Using mongoose virtuals, you can define more sophisticated relationships between documents.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，您仅基于 _id 字段进行填充。但是，有时这不是正确的选择。特别是，无限制增长的数组是MongoDB反模式。使用猫鼬虚拟机，您可以定义文档之间的更复杂的关系。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to query for things in mongodb using a JavaScript expression. You can do so via find({ $where: javascript }), or you can use the mongoose shortcut method $where via a Query chain or from your mongoose Model.
trans-unit.target: 有时您需要使用JavaScript表达式查询mongodb中的内容。您可以通过 find({ $where: javascript }) ，也可以通过查询链或从Mongoose Model中使用猫鼬快捷方式$ where。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, you need to get the parent of a subdoc. You can access the parent using the parent() function.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您需要获得子文档的父文档。您可以使用 parent() 函数访问父级。

trans-unit.source: Subdocuments
trans-unit.target: Subdocuments

trans-unit.source: Subdocuments are documents embedded in other documents. In Mongoose, this means you can nest schemas in other schemas. Mongoose has two distinct notions of subdocuments: arrays of subdocuments and single nested subdocuments.
trans-unit.target: 子文档是嵌入在其他文档中的文档。在Mongoose中,这意味着你可以将模式嵌套在其他模式中。Mongoose有两个不同的子文档概念:子文档数组和单个嵌套子文档。

trans-unit.source: Subdocuments are similar to normal documents. Nested schemas can have middleware, custom validation logic, virtuals, and any other feature top-level schemas can use. The major difference is that subdocuments are not saved individually, they are saved whenever their top-level parent document is saved.
trans-unit.target: 子文档与普通文档相似。嵌套模式可以具有中间件，自定义验证逻辑，虚函数以及顶级模式可以使用的任何其他功能。主要区别在于子文档不会单独保存，而是在保存其顶级父文档时保存。

trans-unit.source: Subdocuments have save and validatemiddleware just like top-level documents. Calling save() on the parent document triggers the save() middleware for all its subdocuments, and the same for validate() middleware.
trans-unit.target: 子文档与顶级文档一样具有 save 和 validate 中间件的功能。在父文档上调用 save() 会触发所有子文档的 save() 中间件，对于 validate() 中间件也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Subdocuments' pre('save') and pre('validate') middleware execute before the top-level document's pre('save') but after the top-level document's pre('validate') middleware. This is because validating before save() is actually a piece of built-in middleware.
trans-unit.target: 子文档的 pre('save') 和 pre('validate') 中间件在顶级文档的 pre('save') 之前但在顶级文档的 pre('validate') 中间件之后执行。这是因为在 save() 之前进行验证实际上是内置的中间件。

trans-unit.source: Suppose you are implementing user registration for a website. Users provide an email and password, which gets saved to mongodb. The email is a string that you will want to normalize to lower case, in order to avoid one email having more than one account -- e.g., otherwise, avenue@q.com can be registered for 2 accounts via avenue@q.com and AvEnUe@Q.CoM.
trans-unit.target: 假设您正在实现网站的用户注册。用户提供电子邮件和密码，该电子邮件和密码将保存到mongodb。电子邮件是一个字符串，你将要归为小写，以避免有一个以上的账户一个电子邮件-例如，否则，avenue@q.com可以通过注册2个帐户avenue@q.com和AvEnUe@Q.CoM。

trans-unit.source: Suppose you are storing credit card numbers and you want to hide everything except the last 4 digits to the mongoose user. You can do so by defining a getter in the following way:

trans-unit.source: Suppose you wanted to track different types of events in a single collection. Every event will have a timestamp, but events that represent clicked links should have a URL. You can achieve this using the model.discriminator() function. This function takes 3 parameters, a model name, a discriminator schema and an optional key (defaults to the model name). It returns a model whose schema is the union of the base schema and the discriminator schema.

trans-unit.source: The refPath option is a more sophisticated alternative to ref. If ref is just a string, Mongoose will always query the same model to find the populated subdocs. With refPath, you can configure what model Mongoose uses for each document.
trans-unit.target: 该 refPath 选项是一个更复杂的替代 ref 。如果 ref 只是一个字符串，Mongoose将始终查询同一模型以查找填充的子文档。使用 refPath ，您可以配置Mongoose用于每个文档的模型。

trans-unit.source: The retainKeyOrder option was removed, mongoose will now always retain the same key position when cloning objects. If you have queries or indexes that rely on reverse key order, you will have to change them.
trans-unit.target: 该 retainKeyOrder 选项被删除，猫鼬将现在总是克隆对象时保持相同的核心地位。如果您有依赖于反向键顺序的查询或索引，则必须对其进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The save() function triggers validate() hooks, because mongoose has a built-in pre('save') hook that calls validate(). This means that all pre('validate') and post('validate') hooks get called before any pre('save') hooks.
trans-unit.target: 在 save() 函数触发 validate() 挂钩，因为猫鼬拥有一个内置的 pre('save') 挂钩的呼叫 validate() 。这意味着所有 pre('validate') 和 post('validate') 挂钩都在任何 pre('save') 挂钩之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: The saveErrorIfNotFound option was removed, mongoose will now always error out from save() if the underlying document was not found
trans-unit.target: 该 saveErrorIfNotFound 选项被删除，猫鼬将现在总是报错了 save() 如果没有被发现的基本文件

trans-unit.target: 该 setDefaultsOnInsert 选项依赖于MongoDB的 $setOnInsert 操作。在 $setOnInsert 运营商在MongoDB的2.4推出。如果您使用的MongoDB服务器<2.4.0，请不要使用 setDefaultsOnInsert 。

trans-unit.source: The shardKey option is used when we have a sharded MongoDB architecture. Each sharded collection is given a shard key which must be present in all insert/update operations. We just need to set this schema option to the same shard key and we’ll be all set.
trans-unit.target: 该 shardKey 当我们有一个选项是用来分片MongoDB的架构。每个分片集合都有一个分片密钥，所有插入/更新操作中都必须存在该分片密钥。我们只需要将此模式选项设置为相同的分片键，就可以完成所有设置。

trans-unit.source: The MongoDB Node.js driver rewrote the tool it uses to parse MongoDB connection strings. Because this is such a big change, they put the new connection string parser behind a flag. To turn on this option, pass the useNewUrlParser option to mongoose.connect() or mongoose.createConnection().
trans-unit.target: MongoDB Node.js驱动程序重写了用于解析MongoDB连接字符串的工具。因为这是一个很大的更改，所以他们将新的连接字符串解析器放在了标志后面。要启用此选项，请将 useNewUrlParser 选项传递给mongoose.connect mongoose.connect() 或mongoose.createConnection mongoose.createConnection() 。

trans-unit.source: The MongoDB driver's remove() function is deprecated in favor of deleteOne() and deleteMany(). This is to comply with the MongoDB CRUD specification, which aims to provide a consistent API for CRUD operations across all MongoDB drivers.
trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用MongoDB驱动程序的 remove() 函数，而推荐使用 deleteOne() 和 deleteMany() 。这符合MongoDB CRUD规范，该规范旨在为所有MongoDB驱动程序中的CRUD操作提供一致的API。

trans-unit.source: Think about modeling a bank account in Mongoose. To transfer money from account A to account B, you would decrement A's balance and increment B's balance. trans-unit.source: To get the most out of MongoDB, you need to learn the basics of MongoDB schema design. SQL schema design (third normal form) was designed to minimize storage costs, whereas MongoDB schema design is about making common queries as fast as possible. The 6 Rules of Thumb for MongoDB Schema Design blog series is an excellent resource for learning the basic rules for making your queries fast.

trans-unit.source: Validation is middleware. Mongoose registers validation as a pre('save') hook on every schema by default.
trans-unit.target: 验证是中间件。猫鼬默认 pre('save') 验证注册为每个模式上的pre（'save'）钩子。

trans-unit.source: Validation is asynchronously recursive; when you call Model#save, sub-document validation is executed as well. If an error occurs, your Model#save callback receives it
trans-unit.target: 验证是异步递归的；当您调用Model＃save时，也会执行子文档验证。如果发生错误，您的Model＃save回调会收到该错误

trans-unit.source: Validation is customizable
trans-unit.target: 验证是可定制的

trans-unit.source: Validation is defined in the SchemaType
trans-unit.target: 验证在SchemaType中定义

trans-unit.source: Validation occurs pre('save') or whenever you manually execute document#validate.
trans-unit.target: 验证发生在 pre('save') 之前,或者每当您手动执行document＃validate时进行。

trans-unit.source: Validators always receive the value to validate as their first argument and must return Boolean. Returning false or throwing an error means validation failed.
trans-unit.target: 验证器始终接收要验证的值作为其第一个参数，并且必须返回 Boolean 。返回 false 或引发错误意味着验证失败。

trans-unit.source: Validators are not run on undefined values. The only exception is the required validator.
trans-unit.target: 验证程序不在未定义的值上运行。唯一的例外是 required 验证器。

trans-unit.source: Values are cast to their appropriate types when using the findAndModify helpers. However, the below are not executed by default.
trans-unit.target: 当使用findAndModify帮助器时,值会被转换为适当的类型。然而,以下内容默认不执行。

trans-unit.source: Want to learn how to check whether your favorite npm modules work with async/await without cobbling together contradictory answers from Google and Stack Overflow? Chapter 4 of Mastering Async/Await explains the basic principles for determining whether frameworks like React and Mongoose support async/await. Get your copy!
trans-unit.target: 是否想了解如何在不将Google和Stack Overflow相互矛盾的答案汇总在一起的情况下，检查自己喜欢的npm模块是否与async / await一起使用？掌握异步/等待的第4章介绍了确定诸如React和Mongoose之类的框架是否支持异步/等待的基本原理。得到你的副本！

trans-unit.source: Want to register a plugin for all schemas? The mongoose singleton has a .plugin() function that registers a plugin for every schema. For example:
trans-unit.target: 是否要为所有模式注册插件？猫鼬单例具有一个 .plugin() 函数，该函数为每个模式注册一个插件。例如：

trans-unit.source: We have a pending connection to the test database running on localhost. We now need to get notified if we connect successfully or if a connection error occurs:
trans-unit.target: 我们有一个与运行在localhost上的测试数据库的待定连接。现在我们需要得到通知,如果我们连接成功或发生连接错误。

trans-unit.source: We have talking kittens! But we still haven't saved anything to MongoDB. Each document can be saved to the database by calling its save method. The first argument to the callback will be an error if any occurred.
trans-unit.target: 我们有会说话的小猫！但是我们仍然没有将任何内容保存到MongoDB。每个文档都可以通过调用其save方法保存到数据库中。如果发生回调，则回调的第一个参数将是错误。

trans-unit.source: We just added last-modified behavior to both our Game and Player schemas and declared an index on the lastMod path of our Games to boot. Not bad for a few lines of code.
trans-unit.target: 我们只是将最后修改的行为添加到我们的 Game 和 Player 模式中，并在要启动的Games 的 lastMod 路径上声明了一个索引。几行代码还不错。

trans-unit.source: We just logged all of the kittens in our db to the console. If we want to filter our kittens by name, Mongoose supports MongoDBs rich querying syntax.
trans-unit.target: 我们只是将数据库中的所有小猫记录到控制台。如果我们想按名称过滤小猫，Mongoose支持MongoDB丰富的查询语法。

trans-unit.source: We may find however, if we use the author object, we are unable to get a list of the stories. This is because no story objects were ever 'pushed' onto author.stories.
trans-unit.target: 但是，我们可能会发现，如果使用 author 对象，则无法获取故事列表。这是因为没有 story 对象曾经被“推”到 author.stories 上。

trans-unit.source: We may need to perform a transformation of the resulting object based on some criteria, say to remove some sensitive information or return a custom object. In this case we set the optional transform function.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能需要根据某些条件对结果对象进行转换，例如删除一些敏感信息或返回自定义对象。在这种情况下，我们设置了可选的 transform 功能。

trans-unit.source: We no longer have a pre-compiled version of mongoose for the browser. If you want to use mongoose schemas in the browser, you need to build your own bundle with browserify/webpack.
trans-unit.target: 我们不再有针对浏览器的mongoose预编译版本。如果你想在浏览器中使用mongoose模式,你需要用browserify/webpack构建自己的捆绑包。

trans-unit.source: When a Query is passed, conditions, field selection and options are merged.
trans-unit.target: 通过Query时,条件、字段选择和选项会被合并。

trans-unit.source: When called with one argument, the most recent path passed to where() is used.
trans-unit.target: 当使用一个参数调用时，将使用传递到 where() 的最新路径。

trans-unit.source: When executing a query with a callback function, you specify your query as a JSON document. The JSON document's syntax is the same as the MongoDB shell.
trans-unit.target: 使用 callback 函数执行查询时，您可以将查询指定为JSON文档。JSON文档的语法与MongoDB shell相同。

trans-unit.source: When to Use Lean
trans-unit.target: 何时使用精益

trans-unit.source: When using string syntax, prefixing a path with - will flag that path as excluded. When a path does not have the - prefix, it is included. Lastly, if a path is prefixed with +, it forces inclusion of the path, which is useful for paths excluded at the schema level.
trans-unit.target: 使用字符串语法时，在路径前面加上 - 将将该路径标记为已排除。如果路径没有 - 前缀，则将其包括在内。最后，如果路径以 + 开头，则会强制包含该路径，这对于在架构级别排除的路径很有用。

trans-unit.source: When using update validators, required validators only fail when you try to explicitly $unset the key.
trans-unit.target: 使用更新验证器时，仅当您尝试显式 $unset 键时， required 验证器才会失败。

trans-unit.source: When you call mongoose.model() on a schema, Mongoose compiles a model for you.
trans-unit.target: 当您在架构上调用 mongoose.model() 时，Mongoose会为您编译一个模型。

trans-unit.source: When you enable useUnifiedTopology, please remove those options from your mongoose.connect() or createConnection() calls.
trans-unit.target: 启用 useUnifiedTopology 时，请从mongoose.connect mongoose.connect() 或 createConnection() 调用中删除这些选项。

trans-unit.source: When you execute the query using Query#exec() or Query#then(), Mongoose casts the filter to match your schema.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 Query#exec() 或 Query#then() 执行查询时，Mongoose 强制转换过滤器以匹配您的架构。

trans-unit.source: When you load documents from MongoDB using model functions like findOne(), you get a Mongoose document back.
trans-unit.target: 当使用诸如 findOne() 之类的模型函数从MongoDB加载文档时，您会得到一个Mongoose文档。

trans-unit.source: When you use Model.create(), mongoose will pull the correct type from the discriminator key for you.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 Model.create() 时，猫鼬将从您的鉴别键中提取正确的类型。

trans-unit.source: When your application starts up, Mongoose automatically calls createIndex for each defined index in your schema. Mongoose will call createIndex for each index sequentially, and emit an 'index' event on the model when all the createIndex calls succeeded or when there was an error. While nice for development, it is recommended this behavior be disabled in production since index creation can cause a significant performance impact. Disable the behavior by setting the autoIndex option of your schema to false, or globally on the connection by setting the option autoIndex to false.
trans-unit.target: 当您的应用程序启动时，Mongoose会自动为架构中的每个已定义索引调用 createIndex 。猫鼬将依次为每个索引调用 createIndex ，并在所有 createIndex 调用成功或发生错误时在模型上发出“ index”事件。虽然有利于开发，但建议在生产中禁用此行为，因为创建索引会严重影响性能。通过设置禁止行为 autoIndex 您的架构的选项 false ，或者通过在全球范围的选项设置的连接 autoIndex ，以 false 。

trans-unit.source: Whether to include or exclude this path by default when loading documents using find(), findOne(), etc.
trans-unit.target: 使用 find() ， findOne() 等加载文档时，默认情况下是否包括此路径。

trans-unit.source: With Mongoose Documents and save()
trans-unit.target: 与猫鼬文档和 save()

trans-unit.source: With Mongoose, everything is derived from a Schema. Let's get a reference to it and define our kittens.
trans-unit.target: 对于Mongoose，一切都源自Schema。让我们参考它并定义我们的小猫。

trans-unit.source: With the Aggregation Framework
trans-unit.target: 有了聚合框架

trans-unit.source: With transformations we can do a lot more than remove properties. We can even return completely new customized objects:
trans-unit.target: 通过转换,我们可以做的不仅仅是删除属性。我们甚至可以返回全新的自定义对象。

trans-unit.source: Wraps Array#pop with proper change tracking.
trans-unit.target: 用适当的更改跟踪包装 Array#pop 。

trans-unit.source: Wraps Array#push with proper change tracking.
trans-unit.target: 用适当的更改跟踪包装 Array#push 。

trans-unit.source: Wraps Array#sort with proper change tracking.
trans-unit.target: 用适当的更改跟踪包装 Array#sort 。

trans-unit.source: Wraps Array#splice with proper change tracking and casting.
trans-unit.target: 用适当的更改跟踪和转换包装 Array#splice 。

trans-unit.source: Wraps Array#shift with proper change tracking.
trans-unit.target: 用适当的更改跟踪包装 Array#shift 。

trans-unit.source: Wraps Array#unshift with proper change tracking.
trans-unit.target: 使用适当的更改跟踪包装 Array#unshift 。

trans-unit.source: Write operations like update(), updateOne(), updateMany(), and findOneAndUpdate() only check the top-level schema's strict mode setting.
trans-unit.target: 诸如 update() ， updateOne() ， updateMany() 和 findOneAndUpdate() 之类的写操作仅检查顶层模式的严格模式设置。

trans-unit.source: Yet more
trans-unit.target: 然而,更多

trans-unit.source: You cannot access the document being updated in pre('updateOne') or pre('findOneAndUpdate') middleware. If you need to access the document that will be updated, you need to execute an explicit query for the document.
trans-unit.target: 您无法在 pre('updateOne') 或 pre('findOneAndUpdate') 中间件中访问正在更新的文档。如果需要访问将要更新的文档，则需要对文档执行显式查询。

trans-unit.source: You can stream query results from MongoDB. You need to call the Query#cursor() function to return an instance of QueryCursor.
trans-unit.target: 您可以从MongoDB 流查询结果。您需要调用Query＃cursor（）函数以返回QueryCursor的实例。

trans-unit.source: You can only use this option on subdocuments. Mongoose can't save a document without knowing its id, so you will get an error if you try to save a document without an _id.
trans-unit.target: 您只能在子文档上使用此选项。猫鼬无法在不知道其ID的情况下保存文档，因此，如果您尝试在不使用 _id 的情况下保存文档，则会出现错误。

trans-unit.source: You can add any property you want to your SchemaType options. Many plugins rely on custom SchemaType options. For example, the mongoose-autopopulate plugin automatically populates paths if you set autopopulate: true in your SchemaType options. Mongoose comes with support for several built-in SchemaType options, like lowercase in the above example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将所需的任何属性添加到SchemaType选项。许多插件都依赖自定义SchemaType选项。例如，如果在SchemaType选项中将 autopopulate: true 设置为true，则mongoose-autopopulate插件会自动填充路径。Mongoose随附了对多个内置SchemaType选项的支持，例如上例中的 lowercase 。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the global useNewUrlParser option to turn on useNewUrlParser for every connection by default.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以设置全局 useNewUrlParser 选项，以默认情况下为每个连接打开 useNewUrlParser 。

trans-unit.source: You can also add a custom setter to your virtual that will let you set both first name and last name via the fullName virtual.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在虚拟机中添加自定义设置器，以便通过 fullName 虚拟机设置名字和姓氏。

trans-unit.source: You can also add query helper functions, which are like instance methods but for mongoose queries. Query helper methods let you extend mongoose's chainable query builder API.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以添加查询助手功能，该功能类似于实例方法，但适用于猫鼬查询。查询帮助器方法使您可以扩展猫鼬的可链接查询构建器API。

trans-unit.source: You can also add static functions to your model. There are 2 equivalent ways to add a static:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以给你的模型添加静态函数。有2种等价的方式来添加静态。

trans-unit.source: You can also configure useCreateIndex by passing it through the connection options.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过将其传递给连接选项来配置 useCreateIndex 。

trans-unit.source: You can also configure useFindAndModify by passing it through the connection options.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过将 useFindAndModify 通过连接选项进行配置。

trans-unit.source: You can also connect to multiple mongos instances for high availability in a sharded cluster. You do not need to pass any special options to connect to multiple mongos in mongoose 5.x.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以连接到多个mongos实例，以在分片群集中实现高可用性。您无需传递任何特殊选项即可连接到mongoose 5.x中的多个mongos。

trans-unit.source: You can also declare aliases on nested paths. It is easier to use nested schemas and subdocuments, but you can also declare nested path aliases inline as long as you use the full nested path nested.myProp as the alias.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在嵌套路径上声明别名。使用嵌套模式和子文档更加容易，但是只要您使用完整的嵌套路径 nested.myProp 作为别名，也可以内联声明嵌套路径别名。

trans-unit.source: You can also define MongoDB indexes using schema type options.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用架构类型选项定义MongoDB索引。

trans-unit.source: You can also define discriminators on embedded document arrays. Embedded discriminators are different because the different discriminator types are stored in the same document array (within a document) rather than the same collection. In other words, embedded discriminators let you store subdocuments matching different schemas in the same array.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在嵌入式文档数组上定义判别器。嵌入的判别器是不同的,因为不同的判别器类型存储在同一个文档数组中(文档内),而不是同一个集合中。换句话说,嵌入式判别器让您可以在同一个数组中存储匹配不同模式的子文档。

trans-unit.source: You can also define discriminators on single nested subdocuments, similar to how you can define discriminators on arrays of subdocuments.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在单个嵌套的子文档上定义判别器,类似于在子文档数组上定义判别器的方式。

trans-unit.source: You can also define embedded discriminators on embedded discriminators. In the below example, sub_events is an embedded discriminator, and for sub_event keys with value 'SubEvent', sub_events.events is an embedded discriminator.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在嵌入式标识符上定义嵌入式标识符。在下面的示例中， sub_events 是嵌入式区分 sub_event ，对于值为'SubEvent'的sub_event键， sub_events.events 是嵌入式区分符。

trans-unit.source: You can also define hooks for the Model.aggregate() function. In aggregation middleware functions, this refers to the Mongoose Aggregate object. For example, suppose you're implementing soft deletes on a Customer model by adding an isDeleted property. To make sure aggregate() calls only look at customers that aren't soft deleted, you can use the below middleware to add a $match stage to the beginning of each aggregation pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以为 Model.aggregate() 函数定义钩子。在聚合中间件函数中， this 是指Mongoose Aggregate 对象。例如，假设您正在通过添加 isDeleted 属性在 Customer 模型上实现软删除。为了确保 aggregate() 调用仅查看未软删除的客户，可以使用以下中间件在每个聚合管道的开头添加 $match 阶段。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the default schema option to a function. Mongoose will execute that function and use the return value as the default.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以将 default 模式选项设置为函数。猫鼬将执行该功能并将返回值用作默认值。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify driver options in your connection string as parameters in the query string portion of the URI. This only applies to options passed to the MongoDB driver. You can't set Mongoose-specific options like bufferCommands in the query string.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在连接字符串中将驱动程序选项指定为URI 的查询字符串部分中的参数。这仅适用于传递给MongoDB驱动程序的选项。您不能在查询字符串中设置特定于Mongoose的选项，例如 bufferCommands 。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify several more parameters in the uri:
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在 uri 中指定其他几个参数：

trans-unit.source: You can also use setters to modify other properties on the document. If you're setting a property name on a document, the setter will run with this as the document. Be careful, in mongoose 5 setters will also run when querying by name with this as the query.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用设置器来修改文档上的其他属性。如果你设置一个属性 name 上的文档，二传手将运行 this 作为文档。请注意，在猫鼬中使用 this 查询作为 name 进行查询时，也会运行5个setter 。

trans-unit.source: You can also use virtuals to set multiple properties at once as an alternative to custom setters on normal properties. For example, suppose you have two string properties: firstName and lastName. You can create a virtual property fullName that lets you set both of these properties at once. The key detail is that, in virtual getters and setters, this refers to the document the virtual is attached to.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用虚拟机一次设置多个属性，以替代常规属性上的自定义设置器。例如，假设您有两个字符串属性： firstName 和 lastName 。您可以创建一个虚拟属性 fullName ，使您可以同时设置这两个属性。关键的细节是，在虚拟获取器和设置器中， this 是指虚拟机附加到的文档。

trans-unit.source: You can configure the timeout using the serverSelectionTimeoutMS option to mongoose.connect():
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 serverSelectionTimeoutMS mongoose.connect() 的serverSelectionTimeoutMS选项配置超时：

trans-unit.source: You can configure this behavior using the strictQuery option for schemas. This option is analagous to the strict option. Setting strictQuery to true removes non-schema properties from the filter:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用schema的 strictQuery 选项配置此行为。该选项类似于 strict 选项。将 strictQuery 设置为 true 会从过滤器中删除非模式属性：

trans-unit.source: You can connect to MongoDB with the mongoose.connect() method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 mongoose.connect() 方法连接到MongoDB 。

trans-unit.source: You can declare a schema type using the type directly, or an object with a type property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以直接使用类型声明架构类型，也可以使用具有 type 属性的对象声明架构类型。

trans-unit.source: You can find a full list of officially supported plugins on Mongoose's plugins search site.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在Mongoose的插件搜索网站上找到正式支持的插件的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: You can find the return type of specific operations in the api docs
trans-unit.target: 您可以在api文档中找到特定操作的返回类型

trans-unit.source: You can manually populate a property by setting it to a document. The document must be an instance of the model your ref property refers to.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过将属性设置为文档来手动填充属性。该文档必须是您的 ref 属性引用的模型的实例。

trans-unit.source: You can manually run validation using doc.validate(callback) or doc.validateSync()
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 doc.validate(callback) 或 doc.validateSync() 手动运行验证

trans-unit.source: You can pass options to Schema.pre() and Schema.post() to switch whether Mongoose calls your remove() hook for Document.remove() or Model.remove():
trans-unit.target: 您可以将选项传递给 Schema.pre() 和 Schema.post() 来切换Mongoose是调用 Document.remove() 还是 Model.remove() 的 remove() 钩子：

trans-unit.source: You can populate in either pre or post hooks. If you want to always populate a certain field, check out the mongoose-autopopulate plugin.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在前或后挂钩中填充。如果您想始终填充某个字段，请查看mongoose-autopopulate插件。

trans-unit.source: You can read more about change streams in mongoose in this blog post.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在此博客文章中了解有关猫鼬更改流的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: You can set up email lower case normalization easily via a Mongoose setter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过Mongoose设置器轻松设置电子邮件小写正常化。

trans-unit.source: You can think of a Mongoose schema as the configuration object for a Mongoose model. A SchemaType is then a configuration object for an individual property. A SchemaType says what type a given path should have, whether it has any getters/setters, and what values are valid for that path.
trans-unit.target: 你可以把Mongoose模式看作是Mongoose模型的配置对象。SchemaType则是一个单独属性的配置对象。SchemaType 说明了一个给定的路径应该有什么类型,它是否有任何获取器/设置器,以及什么值对该路径有效。

trans-unit.source: You can use this function to inspect the schema type for a given path, including what validators it has and what the type is.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用这个函数来检查给定路径的模式类型,包括它有哪些验证器以及类型是什么。

trans-unit.source: You can work around this by setting the _id option to false in the discriminator schema as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过在鉴别器模式中将 _id 选项设置为false来解决此问题，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass parameters to the next pre middleware in the chain using next() in mongoose 5.x. In mongoose 4, next('Test') in pre middleware would call the next middleware with 'Test' as a parameter. Mongoose 5.x has removed support for this.
trans-unit.target: 您不能使用mongoose 5.x中的 next() 将参数传递给链中的下一个前置中间件。在猫鼬4中，前置中间件中的 next('Test') 将以“ Test”为参数调用下一个中间件。Mongoose 5.x已删除对此的支持。

trans-unit.target: 如果从4.x升级到5.x并且未在4.x中使用 useMongoClient 选项，则可能会看到以下弃用警告：

trans-unit.source: You might use asynchronous validators to retreive other documents from the database to validate against or to meet other I/O bound validation needs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用异步验证器从数据库中检索其他文档来进行验证,或者满足其他I/O绑定的验证需求。

trans-unit.source: You should use getFilter() instead of getQuery() where possible. getQuery() will likely be deprecated in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 您应该尽可能使用 getFilter() 而不是 getQuery() 。在将来的版本中，不建议使用 getQuery() 。

trans-unit.source: [obj.propsParameter=false] «Boolean» If true, Mongoose will pass the validator properties object (with the validator function, message, etc.) as the 2nd arg to the validator function. This is disabled by default because many validators rely on positional args, so turning this on may cause unpredictable behavior in external validators.
trans-unit.target: [obj.propsParameter = false]«Boolean»如果为true，Mongoose将把验证器属性对象（带有 validator 功能， message 等）作为第二个参数传递给验证器功能。默认情况下禁用此功能，因为许多验证器都依赖于位置args，因此将其打开可能会导致外部验证器发生不可预测的行为。

trans-unit.source: [obj.validator] «Function» validator function. If the validator function returns undefined or a truthy value, validation succeeds. If it returns falsy (except undefined) or throws an error, validation fails.
trans-unit.target: [obj.validator]«功能»验证器功能。如果验证器函数返回 undefined 或真实值，则验证成功。如果返回falsy（ undefined 除外）或引发错误，则验证失败。

trans-unit.source: [options.bufferCommands=true] «Boolean» Mongoose specific option. Set to false to disable buffering on all models associated with this connection.
trans-unit.target: [options.bufferCommands = true]«布尔»猫鼬特定选项。设置为false可禁用与此连接关联的所有模型上的缓冲。

trans-unit.source: [options.bufferMaxEntries] «Number» The MongoDB driver also has its own buffering mechanism that kicks in when the driver is disconnected. Set this option to 0 and set bufferCommands to false on your schemas if you want your database operations to fail immediately when the driver is not connected, as opposed to waiting for reconnection.
trans-unit.target: [options.bufferMaxEntries]«Number»MongoDB驱动程序还具有其自己的缓冲机制，该机制在断开驱动程序时会启动。如果希望在未连接驱动程序时数据库操作立即失败，而不是等待重新连接，则将此模式设置为0并将模式上的 bufferCommands 设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: [options.bypassDocumentValidation=false] «Boolean» If true, disable MongoDB server-side schema validation for all writes in this bulk.
trans-unit.target: [options.bypassDocumentValidation = false]«布尔»如果为true，则对此批量中的所有写入均禁用MongoDB服务器端模式验证。

trans-unit.source: [options.causalConsistency=true] «Boolean» set to false to disable causal consistency
trans-unit.target: [options.causalConsistency = true]«Boolean»设置为false可禁用因果一致性

trans-unit.source: [options.checkKeys=true] «Boolean» the MongoDB driver prevents you from saving keys that start with '$' or contain '.' by default. Set this option to false to skip that check. See restrictions on field names
trans-unit.target: [options.checkKeys = true]«Boolean»，MongoDB驱动程序阻止您保存以'$'开头或包含'。'的键。默认。将此选项设置为 false 可跳过该检查。查看字段名称限制

trans-unit.source: [options.clone=false] «boolean» When you do BlogPost.find().populate('author'), blog posts with the same author will share 1 copy of an author doc. Enable this option to make Mongoose clone populated docs before assigning them.
trans-unit.target: [options.clone = false]«boolean»当您执行 BlogPost.find().populate('author') ，具有相同作者的博客文章将共享1个 author 文档的副本。启用此选项可以使Mongoose克隆填充的文档，然后再分配它们。

trans-unit.source: [options.connectTimeoutMS=30000] «Number» How long the MongoDB driver will wait before killing a socket due to inactivity during initial connection. Defaults to 30000. This option is passed transparently to Node.js' socket#setTimeout() function.
trans-unit.target: [options.connectTimeoutMS = 30000]«数字»MongoDB驱动程序由于初始连接期间不活动而在杀死套接字之前将等待多长时间。默认值为30000。此选项透明地传递给Node.js的 socket#setTimeout() 函数。

trans-unit.target: [options.count = false]«布尔»仅适用于填充虚拟机。如果为真，则在您 populate() 时，此填充虚拟将包含文档数量，而不是文档本身。

trans-unit.source: [options.count=false] «boolean» if you set this to true, populate() will set this virtual to the number of populated documents, as opposed to the documents themselves, using Query#countDocuments()
trans-unit.target: [options.count = false]«boolean»如果将其设置为 true ，则 populate() 会使用 Query#countDocuments() 将此虚拟设置为已填充文档的数量，而不是文档本身

trans-unit.source: [options.depopulate=false] «Boolean» if true, replace any conventionally populated paths with the original id in the output. Has no affect on virtual populated paths.
trans-unit.target: [options.depopulate = false]«Boolean»如果为true，请在输出中将任何常规填充的路径替换为原始ID。对虚拟填充路径没有影响。

trans-unit.source: [options.document] «Boolean» If name is a hook for both document and query middleware, set to true to run on document middleware.

trans-unit.source: [options.expires=null] «String» Mongoose-specific syntactic sugar, uses ms to convert expires option into seconds for the expireAfterSeconds in the above link.

trans-unit.source: [options.getters=false] «Boolean» if true, apply all getters, including virtuals
trans-unit.target: [options.getters = false]«Boolean»如果为true，则应用所有的getter，包括虚函数

trans-unit.source: [options.getters=false] «boolean» if true, Mongoose will call any getters defined on the localField. By default, Mongoose gets the raw value of localField. For example, you would need to set this option to true if you wanted to add a lowercase getter to your localField.
trans-unit.target: [options.getters = false]«boolean»如果为true，Mongoose将调用在 localField 上定义的任何getter 。默认情况下，猫鼬获取 localField 的原始值。例如，如果要将 lowercase getter 添加到 localField ,则需要将此选项设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: [options.getters=false] «boolean» if you set this to true, Mongoose will call any custom getters you defined on this virtual
trans-unit.target: [options.getters = false]«boolean»如果将其设置为 true ，Mongoose将调用您在此虚拟机上定义的任何自定义吸气剂

trans-unit.source: [options.includeChildren=false] «Boolean» if true, returns children of modified paths as well. For example, if false, the list of modified paths for doc.colors = { primary: 'blue' }; will not contain colors.primary. If true, modifiedPaths() will return an array that contains colors.primary.
trans-unit.target: [options.includeChildren = false]«Boolean»如果为true，则还返回修改路径的子级。例如，如果为false，则为 doc.colors = { primary: 'blue' }; 的修改路径的列表。将不包含 colors.primary 。如果为true，则 colors.primary modifiedPaths() 将返回一个包含colors.primary的数组。

trans-unit.source: [options.isRequired] «Boolean|Function» enable/disable the validator, or function that returns required boolean
trans-unit.target: [options.isRequired]«Boolean | Function»启用/禁用验证器，或者返回所需布尔值的函数

trans-unit.source: [options.j=true] «Boolean» If false, disable journal acknowledgement
trans-unit.target: [options.j = true]«布尔值»如果为false，则禁用日记帐确认

trans-unit.source: [options.j] «Boolean» set to true for MongoDB to wait until this save() has been journaled before resolving the returned promise. Overrides the schema-level writeConcern option
trans-unit.target: [options.j]«Boolean»设置为true，MongoDB 在解析返回的promise之前要等到该 save() 被记录下来。覆盖架构级别的 writeConcern 选项

trans-unit.source: [options.justOne=false] «Boolean|Function» Only works with populate virtuals. If truthy, will be a single doc or null. Otherwise, the populate virtual will be an array.
trans-unit.target: [options.justOne = false]«布尔值|函数»仅适用于填充虚拟机。如果为真，则为单个文档或为 null 。否则，填充的虚拟对象将是一个数组。

trans-unit.source: [options.justOne=false] «boolean» by default, a populated virtual is an array. If you set justOne, the populated virtual will be a single doc or null.
trans-unit.target: [options.justOne = false]默认情况下，“ boolean”是一个数组。如果设置了 justOne ，则填充的虚拟机将为单个doc或 null 。

trans-unit.source: [options.lean] «Object» if truthy, mongoose will return the document as a plain JavaScript object rather than a mongoose document. See Query.lean().
trans-unit.target: [options.lean]«Object»如果属实，猫鼬会将文档作为纯JavaScript对象而不是猫鼬文档返回。参见 Query.lean() 。

trans-unit.source: [options.lean] «Object» if truthy, mongoose will return the document as a plain JavaScript object rather than a mongoose document. See Query.lean() and the Mongoose lean tutorial.
trans-unit.target: [options.lean]«Object»如果属实，猫鼬会将文档作为纯JavaScript对象而不是猫鼬文档返回。参见 Query.lean() 和Mongoose lean教程。

trans-unit.source: [options.lean] «Object» if truthy, mongoose will return the document as a plain JavaScript object rather than a mongoose document. See Query.lean() and the Mongoose lean tutorial.
trans-unit.target: [options.lean]«Object»如果属实，猫鼬会将文档作为纯JavaScript对象而不是猫鼬文档返回。参见 Query.lean() 和Mongoose lean教程。

trans-unit.source: [options.lean] «Object|Boolean» if truthy, mongoose will return the document as a plain JavaScript object rather than a mongoose document. See Query.lean() and the Mongoose lean tutorial.
trans-unit.target: [options.lean]«Object | Boolean»如果属实，猫鼬会将文档作为纯JavaScript对象而不是猫鼬文档返回。参见 Query.lean() 和Mongoose lean教程。

trans-unit.source: [options.localField] «String|Function» Required for populate virtuals. See populate virtual docs for more information.
trans-unit.target: [options.localField]«String | Function»对于填充虚拟机是必需的。有关更多信息，请参见填充虚拟文档。

trans-unit.source: [options.localField] «string|function» the local field to populate on if this is a populated virtual.
trans-unit.target: [options.localField]«string | function»如果是填充的虚拟，则要填充的本地字段。

trans-unit.source: [options.match=null] «Object|Function» Add an additional filter to the populate query. Can be a filter object containing MongoDB query syntax, or a function that returns a filter object.
trans-unit.target: [options.match = null]«对象|功能»向填充查询添加其他过滤器。可以是包含MongoDB查询语法的过滤器对象，也可以是返回过滤器对象的函数。

trans-unit.source: [options.minimize=true] «Boolean» if true, omit any empty objects from the output
trans-unit.target: [options.minimize = true]«Boolean»如果为true，则从输出中省略任何空对象

trans-unit.source: [options.multi=false] «Boolean» whether multiple documents should be updated or just the first one that matches filter.
trans-unit.target: [options.multi = false]《布尔值》是应更新多个文档还是仅更新与 filter 匹配的第一个文档。

trans-unit.source: [options.multipleCastError] «Boolean» by default, mongoose only returns the first error that occurred in casting the query. Turn on this option to aggregate all the cast errors.
trans-unit.target: [options.multipleCastError]默认情况下为“布尔”，猫鼬仅返回在投射查询时发生的第一个错误。启用此选项可汇总所有强制转换错误。

trans-unit.source: [options.omitUndefined=false] «Boolean» If true, delete any properties whose value is undefined when casting an update. In other words, if this is set, Mongoose will delete baz from the update in Model.updateOne({}, { foo: 'bar', baz: undefined }) before sending the update to the server.
trans-unit.target: [options.omitUndefined = false]«布尔»如果为true，则在投射更新时删除其值 undefined 所有属性。换句话说，如果设置了此选项，Mongoose将在将更新发送到服务器之前从 Model.updateOne({}, { foo: 'bar', baz: undefined }) 的更新中删除 baz 。

trans-unit.source: [options.options=null] «Object» Additional options like limit and lean.
trans-unit.target: [options.options = null]«对象»附加选项，例如 limit 和 lean 。

trans-unit.source: [options.ordered «Boolean» = true] if true, will fail fast on the first error encountered. If false, will insert all the documents it can and report errors later. An insertMany() with ordered = false is called an "unordered" insertMany().
trans-unit.target: [options.ordered«Boolean»= true]如果为true，则会在遇到第一个错误时快速失败。如果为false，将插入所有可能的文档并稍后报告错误。一个 insertMany() 与 ordered = false 被称为“无序” insertMany() 。

trans-unit.source: [options.ordered=true] «Boolean» If true, execute writes in order and stop at the first error. If false, execute writes in parallel and continue until all writes have either succeeded or errored.
trans-unit.target: [options.ordered = true]«Boolean»如果为true，则按顺序执行写入操作并在第一个错误处停止。如果为false，则并行执行写入并继续直到所有写入成功或出错。

trans-unit.source: [options.overwrite=false] «Boolean» By default, if you don't include any update operators in doc, Mongoose will wrap doc in $set for you. This prevents you from accidentally overwriting the document. This option tells Mongoose to skip adding $set.
trans-unit.target: [options.overwrite = false]«Boolean»默认情况下，如果您在 doc 中不包含任何更新运算符，Mongoose将为您将 doc 包装在 $set 中。这样可以防止您意外覆盖文档。此选项告诉Mongoose跳过添加 $set 。

trans-unit.source: [options.parallel] «Number» the number of promises to execute in parallel. Defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: [options.parallel]«Number»并行执行的承诺数。默认为1。

trans-unit.source: [options.pass] «String» password for authentication, equivalent to options.auth.password. Maintained for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: [options.pass]«String»身份验证密码，等效于 options.auth.password 。保持向后兼容性。

trans-unit.source: [options.path=null] «String» The path to populate.
trans-unit.target: [options.path = null]«String»要填充的路径。

trans-unit.source: [options.poolSize=5] «Number» The maximum number of sockets the MongoDB driver will keep open for this connection. By default, poolSize is 5. Keep in mind that, as of MongoDB 3.4, MongoDB only allows one operation per socket at a time, so you may want to increase this if you find you have a few slow queries that are blocking faster queries from proceeding. See Slow Trains in MongoDB and Node.js.
trans-unit.target: [options.poolSize = 5]«Number»MongoDB驱动程序将为此连接保持打开状态的最大套接字数。默认情况下， poolSize 为5。请记住，从MongoDB 3.4开始，MongoDB一次只允许每个套接字一次操作，因此，如果发现有一些慢查询阻止了更快的查询，则可能需要增加此操作。进行中。请参阅MongoDB和Node.js中的慢速火车。

trans-unit.source: [options.promiseLibrary] «Class» Sets the underlying driver's promise library.
trans-unit.target: [options.promiseLibrary]«Class»设置基础驱动程序的 Promise 库。

trans-unit.source: [options.query] «Boolean» If name is a hook for both document and query middleware, set to true to run on query middleware.
trans-unit.target: [options.query]«Boolean»如果 name 是文档和查询中间件的挂钩，则将其设置为 true 可在查询中间件上运行。

trans-unit.source: [options.rawResult «Boolean» = false] if false, the returned promise resolves to the documents that passed mongoose document validation. If true, will return the raw result from the MongoDB driver with a mongoose property that contains validationErrors if this is an unordered insertMany.
trans-unit.target: [options.rawResult«Boolean»= false]如果为false，则返回的承诺将解析为通过猫鼬文档验证的文档。如果 true ，将返回从MongoDB的驱动程序原始结果与 mongoose 包含属性 validationErrors 如果这是一个无序的 insertMany 。

trans-unit.source: [options.rawResult] «Boolean» if true, returns the raw result from the MongoDB driver
trans-unit.target: [options.rawResult]«Boolean»如果为true，则返回MongoDB驱动程序的原始结果

trans-unit.source: [options.reconnectInterval=1000] «Number» See reconnectTries option above.
trans-unit.target: [options.reconnectInterval = 1000]«数字»参见上面的 reconnectTries 选项。

trans-unit.source: [options.reconnectTries=30] «Number» If you're connected to a single server or mongos proxy (as opposed to a replica set), the MongoDB driver will try to reconnect every reconnectInterval milliseconds for reconnectTries times, and give up afterward. When the driver gives up, the mongoose connection emits a reconnectFailed event. This option does nothing for replica set connections.
trans-unit.target: [options.reconnectTries = 30]«Number»如果您连接到单个服务器或mongos代理（与副本集相对），则MongoDB驱动程序将尝试重新连接每个 reconnectInterval 毫秒，以进行 reconnectTries 时间，然后放弃。当驱动程序放弃时，猫鼬连接会发出 reconnectFailed 事件。此选项对副本集连接不起作用。

trans-unit.source: [options.ref] «String|Model» model name or model instance. Marks this as a populate virtual.
trans-unit.target: [options.ref]«String | Model»模型名称或模型实例。将其标记为填充虚拟。

trans-unit.source: [options.ref] «string|function» if ref is not nullish, this becomes a populated virtual
trans-unit.target: [options.ref]«string | function»如果 ref 不为空，则它成为填充的虚拟

trans-unit.source: [options.retainNullValues=false] «boolean» by default, Mongoose removes null and undefined values from populated arrays. Use this option to make populate() retain null and undefined array entries.
trans-unit.target: [options.retainNullValues = false]默认情况下为“ boolean”，Mongoose从填充的数组中删除null和undefined值。使用此选项可以使 populate() 保留 null 和 undefined 数组条目。

trans-unit.source: [options.runValidators=false] «Boolean» if true, runs update validators on this command. Update validators validate the update operation against the model's schema.
trans-unit.target: [options.runValidators = false]«Boolean»如果为true，则在此命令上运行更新验证程序。更新验证器根据模型的架构验证更新操作。

trans-unit.source: [options.safe] «Object» (DEPRECATED) overrides schema's safe option
trans-unit.target: [options.safe]«对象»（不建议使用）覆盖架构的安全选项

trans-unit.source: [options.safe] «Object» (DEPRECATED) overrides schema's safe option. Use the w option instead.
trans-unit.target: [options.safe]«对象»（不建议使用）覆盖架构的安全选项。请使用 w 选项。

trans-unit.source: [options.session=null] «ClientSession» The session associated with this bulk write. See transactions docs.
trans-unit.target: [options.session = null]«ClientSession»与此批量写入关联的会话。查看交易文档。

trans-unit.source: [options.session=null] «ClientSession» The session associated with this query. See transactions docs.
trans-unit.target: [options.session = null]«ClientSession»与该查询关联的会话。查看交易文档。

trans-unit.source: [options.session=null] «Session» the session associated with this operation.
trans-unit.target: [options.session = null]«会话» 与此操作关联的会话。

trans-unit.source: [options.session=null] «Session» the session associated with this operation. If not specified, defaults to the document's associated session.
trans-unit.target: [options.session = null]«会话» 与此操作关联的会话。如果未指定，则默认为文档的关联session。

trans-unit.source: [options.session=null] «Session» the session associated with this save operation. If not specified, defaults to the document's associated session.
trans-unit.target: [options.session = null] 与该保存操作关联的会话 “会话” 。如果未指定，则默认为文档的关联session。

trans-unit.source: [options.setDefaultsOnInsert=false] «Boolean» if this and upsert are true, mongoose will apply the defaults specified in the model's schema if a new document is created. This option only works on MongoDB >= 2.4 because it relies on MongoDB's $setOnInsert operator.
trans-unit.target: [options.setDefaultsOnInsert = false]如果此布尔值和 upsert 为true，则«Boolean»，如果创建了新文档，猫鼬将应用模型架构中指定的默认值。此选项仅在MongoDB> = 2.4上有效，因为它依赖于MongoDB的 $setOnInsert 运算符。

trans-unit.source: [options.skipInvalidIds=false] «Boolean» By default, Mongoose throws a cast error if localField and foreignField schemas don't line up. If you enable this option, Mongoose will instead filter out any localField properties that cannot be casted to foreignField's schema type.
trans-unit.target: [options.skipInvalidIds = false]«布尔值»默认情况下，如果 localField 和 foreignField 模式未对齐，Mongoose会引发强制转换错误。如果启用此选项，Mongoose会过滤掉所有不能转换为 foreignField 架构类型的 localField 属性。

trans-unit.source: [options.socketTimeoutMS=30000] «Number» How long the MongoDB driver will wait before killing a socket due to inactivity after initial connection. A socket may be inactive because of either no activity or a long-running operation. This is set to 30000 by default, you should set this to 2-3x your longest running operation if you expect some of your database operations to run longer than 20 seconds. This option is passed to Node.js socket#setTimeout() function after the MongoDB driver successfully completes.
trans-unit.target: [options.socketTimeoutMS = 30000]«Number»由于初始连接后由于不活动，MongoDB驱动程序将在杀死套接字之前等待多长时间。套接字可能由于没有活动或长时间运行而处于非活动状态。默认情况下将其设置为 30000 ，如果您希望某些数据库操作的运行时间超过20秒，则应将其设置为运行时间最长的2-3倍。MongoDB驱动程序成功完成后，此选项将传递到Node.js socket#setTimeout() 函数。

trans-unit.source: [options.strict] «Boolean|String» overwrites the schema's strict mode option
trans-unit.target: [options.strict]«Boolean | String»覆盖架构的严格模式选项

trans-unit.source: [options.timestamps=null] «Boolean» If set to false and schema-level timestamps are enabled, skip timestamps for this update. Does nothing if schema-level timestamps are not set.
trans-unit.target: [options.timestamps = null]«Boolean»如果设置为 false 并且启用了模式级时间戳，请跳过此更新的时间戳。如果未设置架构级别的时间戳，则不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: [options.timestamps=true] «Boolean» if false and timestamps are enabled, skip timestamps for this save().
trans-unit.target: [options.timestamps = true]«Boolean»如果启用了 false 和时间戳，请跳过此 save() 的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: [options.transform=null] «Function|null» if set, mongoose will call this function to allow you to transform the returned object
trans-unit.target: [options.transform = null]«Function | null»（如果设置），猫鼬将调用此函数以允许您转换返回的对象

trans-unit.source: [options.upsert=false] «Boolean» if true, and no documents found, insert a new document
trans-unit.target: [options.upsert = false]«布尔»，如果为true，并且未找到任何文档，请插入新文档

trans-unit.source: [options.useCache=false] «Boolean» If true, cache results so calling useDb() multiple times with the same name only creates 1 connection object.
trans-unit.target: [options.useCache = false]«Boolean»如果为true，则缓存结果，因此使用相同名称多次调用 useDb() 只会创建1个连接对象。

trans-unit.source: [options.useCreateIndex=true] «Boolean» Mongoose-specific option. If true, this connection will use createIndex() instead of ensureIndex() for automatic index builds via Model.init().
trans-unit.target: [options.useCreateIndex = true]«布尔»猫鼬特定的选项。如果为 true ，则此连接将使用 createIndex() 而不是 ensureIndex() 来通过 Model.init() 进行自动索引构建。

trans-unit.source: [options.useFindAndModify=true] «Boolean» True by default. Set to false to make findOneAndUpdate() and findOneAndRemove() use native findOneAndUpdate() rather than findAndModify().
trans-unit.target: [options.useFindAndModify = true]«Boolean»默认为True。设置为 false 使 findOneAndUpdate() 和 findOneAndRemove() 使用本机的 findOneAndUpdate() 而不是 findAndModify() 。

trans-unit.source: [options.useMongooseAggCursor] «Boolean» use experimental mongoose-specific aggregation cursor (for eachAsync() and other query cursor semantics)
trans-unit.target: [options.useMongooseAggCursor]«Boolean»使用实验性的猫鼬专用聚合光标（针对 eachAsync() 和其他查询光标语义）

trans-unit.source: [options.useNewUrlParser=false] «Boolean» False by default. Set to true to make all connections set the useNewUrlParser option by default.
trans-unit.target: [options.useNewUrlParser = false]«Boolean»默认为False。设置为 true 可使所有连接在默认情况下设置 useNewUrlParser 选项。

trans-unit.source: [options.useNewUrlParser=false] «Boolean» False by default. Set to true to opt in to the MongoDB driver's new URL parser logic.
trans-unit.target: [options.useNewUrlParser = false]«Boolean»默认为False。设置为 true 以选择加入MongoDB驱动程序的新URL解析器逻辑。

trans-unit.source: [options.useUnifiedTopology=false] «Boolean» False by default. Set to true to make all connections set the useUnifiedTopology option by default.
trans-unit.target: [options.useUnifiedTopology = false]«Boolean»默认为False。设置为 true 可使所有连接在默认情况下设置 useUnifiedTopology 选项。

trans-unit.source: [options.useUnifiedTopology=false] «Boolean» False by default. Set to true to opt in to the MongoDB driver's replica set and sharded cluster monitoring engine.
trans-unit.target: [options.useUnifiedTopology = false]«Boolean»默认为False。设置为 true 以选择加入MongoDB驱动程序的副本集和分片群集监视引擎。

trans-unit.source: [options.user] «String» username for authentication, equivalent to options.auth.user. Maintained for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: [options.user]«String»身份验证用户名，等效于 options.auth.user 。保持向后兼容性。

trans-unit.source: [options.validateBeforeSave] «Boolean» set to false to save without validating.
trans-unit.target: [options.validateBeforeSave]«Boolean»设置为false以保存而不进行验证。

trans-unit.source: [options.versionKey=true] «Boolean» if false, exclude the version key (__v by default) from the output
trans-unit.target: [options.versionKey = true]«Boolean»如果为false，则从输出中排除版本密钥（默认为 __v ）

trans-unit.source: [options.virtuals=false] «Boolean» Apply virtuals before getting this path
trans-unit.target: [options.virtuals = false]«布尔»在获取此路径之前应用虚拟

trans-unit.source: [options.virtuals=false] «Boolean» if true, apply virtuals, including aliases. Use { getters: true, virtuals: false } to just apply getters, not virtuals
trans-unit.target: [options.virtuals = false]«Boolean»如果为true，则应用虚拟，包括别名。使用 { getters: true, virtuals: false } 仅应用getters，而不是virtuals

trans-unit.source: [options.w=1] «String|number» The write concern. See Query#w() for more information.
trans-unit.target: [options.w = 1]«String | number» 写入关注点。有关更多信息，请参见 Query#w() 。

trans-unit.source: [options.w] «Number|String» set the write concern. Overrides the schema-level writeConcern option
trans-unit.target: [options.w]«Number | String»设置写关注。覆盖架构级别的 writeConcern 选项

trans-unit.source: [options.writeConcern=null] «Object» sets the write concern for replica sets. Overrides the schema-level write concern
trans-unit.target: [options.writeConcern = null]«对象»设置副本集的写关注。覆盖架构级别的写入问题

trans-unit.source: [options.wtimeout=null] «number» The write concern timeout.
trans-unit.target: [options.wtimeout = null]«number» 写关注超时。

trans-unit.source: [options.wtimeout] «Number» sets a timeout for the write concern. Overrides the schema-level writeConcern option.
trans-unit.target: [options.wtimeout]«Number»设置写关注超时。覆盖架构级别的 writeConcern 选项。

trans-unit.source: omitUndefined: delete any properties whose value is undefined when casting an update. In other words, if this is set, Mongoose will delete baz from the update in Model.updateOne({}, { foo: 'bar', baz: undefined }) before sending the update to the server.
trans-unit.target: omitUndefined：投射更新时，删除其值 undefined 所有属性。换句话说，如果设置了该选项，Mongoose将在将更新发送到服务器之前从 Model.updateOne({}, { foo: 'bar', baz: undefined }) 的更新中删除 baz 。
